dc_description_s: Name:	Transit_CTRAN 		Source:	Clayton County Department of TransportationDate:	2006Extent:	< 10 CountiesFeature:	LineScale:	1:100,000Description:  This Layer was created by Clayton County DOT by capturing selected segments from Clayton County Water Authority's (CCWA) street centerline database.  In some cases, features were digitized on-screen from 2003 or 2005 digital orthophotography provided by CCWA.  ARC's GIS Division then merged the original shapefiles into a single database for ease of use on this CD.  For more information, go to http://web.co.clayton.ga.us/ctran/index.htm.  Pleae note there are a total of 5 (bus) transit Layers on this CD including CCT, Ctran, GCT, GRTA and MARTA.  The geographic extent of this Transit_CTRAN Layer is sub-regional with features located primarily in Clayton County and secondarily in Fulton County.Attributes:	C_TRAN	One or more route numbers for road segment recordRoute	Route number of predominant route
